findings.title: Deployer cannot mint any new tokens
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to mint new tokens after initial deployment.

findings.title: Deployer cannot renounce ownership
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the ability to renounce ownership.

findings.title: Deployer can pause/lock contract
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to pause or lock the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot burn
findings.description: The deployer of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens.
